metadata.title: CVE-2019-12474 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Wikimedia MediaWiki 1.23.0 through 1.32.1 has an information leak.Privileged API responses that include whether a recent change has beenpatrolled may be cached publicly. Fixed in 1.32.2, 1.31.2, 1.30.2 and1.27.6.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
